amendment.description: Amendment sought to cap settlement payments for attorney fees provided in relation to environmental cases at $125 per hour.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 114-724 to cap settlement payments for attorney fees provided in relation to environmental cases at $125 per hour.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 262 (Roll no. 486).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 262 (Roll no. 486).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Gosar.
